org.apache.felix.ipojo.manipulation

Class InnerClassAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.objectweb.asm.ClassVisitor
      • org.apache.felix.ipojo.manipulation.InnerClassAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.objectweb.asm.Opcodes

    public class InnerClassAdapter
extends org.objectweb.asm.ClassVisitor
implements org.objectweb.asm.Opcodes
    Adapts a inner class in order to allow accessing outer class fields. A manipulated inner class has access to the managed field of the outer class. Only non-static inner classes are manipulated, others are not.
    Author:
    Felix Project Team

    • Field Detail

      • m_manipulator

        private final Manipulator m_manipulator
        The manipulator having manipulated the outer class. We add method descriptions to this manipulator.

      • m_name

        private final String m_name
        The name of the inner class. This name is only define in the outer class.

      • m_simpleName

        private final String m_simpleName
        The ismple name of the class.

      • m_outer

        private String m_outer
        Implementation class name.

      • m_fields

        private Set<String> m_fields
        List of fields of the implementation class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • InnerClassAdapter

        public InnerClassAdapter(String name,
                         org.objectweb.asm.ClassVisitor visitor,
                         String outerClassName,
                         Manipulator manipulator)
        Creates the inner class adapter.
        Parameters:
        name - the inner class name (internal name)
        visitor - parent class visitor
        outerClassName - outer class (implementation class)
        manipulator - the manipulator having manipulated the outer class.

    • Method Detail

      • visitMethod

        public org.objectweb.asm.MethodVisitor visitMethod(int access,
                                                   String name,
                                                   String desc,
                                                   String signature,
                                                   String[] exceptions)
        Visits a method. This methods create a code visitor manipulating outer class field accesses.
        Overrides:
        visitMethod in class org.objectweb.asm.ClassVisitor
        Parameters:
        access - method visibility
        name - method name
        desc - method descriptor
        signature - method signature
        exceptions - list of exceptions thrown by the method
        Returns:
        a code adapter manipulating field accesses
        See Also:
        ClassVisitor.visitMethod(int, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String[])

      • getMethodId

        private String getMethodId(String name,
                           String desc)

      • generateMethodWrapper

        private void generateMethodWrapper(int access,
                                   String name,
                                   String desc,
                                   String signature,
                                   String[] exceptions,
                                   List<org.objectweb.asm.tree.LocalVariableNode> localVariables,
                                   List<ClassChecker.AnnotationDescriptor> annotations,
                                   Map<Integer,List<ClassChecker.AnnotationDescriptor>> paramAnnotations)
        Generate the method header of a POJO method. This method header encapsulate the POJO method call to signal entry exit and error to the container. The instance manager and flag are accessed using method calls.
        Parameters:
        access - : access flag.
        name - : method name.
        desc - : method descriptor.
        signature - : method signature.
        exceptions - : declared exceptions.
        localVariables - : the local variable nodes.
        annotations - : the annotations to move to this method.
        paramAnnotations - : the parameter annotations to move to this method.

      • getMethodDescriptor

        private MethodDescriptor getMethodDescriptor(String name,
                                             String desc)
        Gets the method descriptor for the specified name and descriptor. The method descriptor is looked inside the ClassManipulator.m_visitedMethods
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the method
        desc - the descriptor of the method
        Returns:
        the method descriptor or null if not found.
